alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:53PM CST until February 22 at 9:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTRY PRECIPITATION CONTINUING ACROSS THE AREA LATE THIS AFTERNOON... .A low pressure system centered over southwest Lower Michigan late Tuesday afternoon will track to Lake Huron by midnight. Periods of snow generated by the system will continue during the late afternoon, and any lingering sleet over east-central Wisconsin will change to snow. The most persistent heavy snow will occur across north-central Wisconsin. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow, possibly heavy at times. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, with the highest totals near the Upper Michigan border. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, and northeast Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions, including for the afternoon commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
